item.description:
Join us for our Saturday Frenchie meetup at Peter's Park. As we get into the Summer month's we may opt to meet earlier in the morning or in the evening on a weeknight due to heat and vaca's. I'll put together a survey later to see what would work for most.

Otherwise we'll see you there unless it's raining!
About this Meetup Group
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the smaller fenced in area-I'll be wearing a Lei

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: Saturday French Bulldog meetup
